channel.title: catsim on gzt does statistics
channel.description: Recent content in catsim on gzt does statistics

item.title: Talk at JSM Section on Statistics in Imaging: CatSIM, a categorical image metric
item.description: I was one of the winners of the 2021 student paper competition for the ASA Section on Statistics in Imaging. You can see a version of the submitted paper, but substantial edits have been made in response to reviewer feedback in the time between the submission to the competition and the talk. Abstract: We introduce CatSIM, a new similarity metric for binary and multinary two- and three-dimensional images and volumes.

item.title: New preprint for CatSIM
item.description: I have a preprint for one of the project I have been working on, CatSIM. You can find information about that software on the pkgdown site or download it from CRAN.
